main.name: Meghal Donde
main.description: Full Stack Developer with experience in Desktop, Web, Mobile Applications.
main.bio: My name is Meghal, I'm a Full Stack Software Developer. Currently I'm freelancing and coaching young minds Python. Life-long learner! These days learning Data Science and Machine learning Algorithms. I am a nature lover! If I am not coding, you may find me baking.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details about web/mobile apps, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Created real-time charts using C#, ADS.net to connect PLC and HMI on Beckhoff Systems for a automation injection moulding machine.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked on Full stack mobile serverless application using ionic framework(angularJs 1.6) and nodejs microservices using AWS lambda, AWS Cognito, API gateway to create mobile app for tracking symptoms of austistic children.

work.title: Software Developer

testimonials.text: Meghal is highly focussed on the task at hand and doesn't feel accomplished until she is done with it.
